'''Recording Your Anniversary Memories''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 2.1]]. It is part of the [[One Year Anniversary Community Event]]s.

==Event Period==
* September 28 – October 7, 2021 23:59 (UTC+8)
* Results: 10/11/2021

==Rewards==
{{Item|Primogem|24|x=100}} (1,000 winners)

==Platforms==
Twitter, Facebook

==How to Participate==
* Select events or moments from the following images that left a big impression on you in Teyvat and fill in the corresponding stars.
* Post the filled card to your profile with the tags #RecordedMemories and #GenshinImpact (please make sure that both your post and personal account are public)
* If there is no memorable event or moment for the Traveler in the reminiscence cards, then please fill in the last star and enter the most memorable moment or your wish in the space below or in your post content.

Successful Travelers are invited to submit their UID and the link to their card post via the link below. After the event, Paimon will select 1,000 of the most unique cards and send each of the winners a prize of 100 Primogems via in-game mail

[[File:Recording Your Anniversary Memories Memories.png|400px]]

Please stay tuned to the official community as they continue to update you with more events~

You don't want to miss this!

==Event Rules==
# Travelers must be Adventure Rank 10 or higher on the Europe, America, Asia, or TW/HK/MO servers.
# The publishing of content that violates laws, regulations, or social platforms' terms of use is prohibited.
# Publishing content not related to the event, including but not limited to advertisement links and other means of publicity, is prohibited.
# Each Traveler can only participate in the event once.
# The copyright of posted works belongs to their respective creators. Plagiarism, misappropriation, and other actions that violate others' copyright are strictly prohibited.
# There are 1,000 prizes for this event in total for all participating platforms.
